description: A popular general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited to web development. (version 8.2)
post_install: $ini = "zend_extension=$dir\php_xdebug.dll`n[xdebug]`nxdebug.mode=develop,debug`nxdebug.client_port=9003`nxdebug.start_with_request=trigger   # If you always want to use debug, set the value to 'yes'"
Write-Host -f Yellow "PHP 8.2 was not installed through scoop, you have to activate php_xdebug.dll manually! Add the following:`n"
notes: Xdebug is already enabled if PHP 8.2 was installed through scoop!
